src Directory Reference

Files

 am_memory_map.h
 
 freertos_sample.h
 Example program which demonstrates using FreeRTOS.
 
 FreeRTOSConfig.h
 
 hello_task.h
 Simple task with a while() loop that implements a vTaskDelay of 1 second on every iteration. After HELLO_TASK_COUNT iterations (set in src/freertos_sample_test_cases.h), the task breaks out of the while(1) loop, sets bHelloTaskComplete to "true", and suspends/deletes itself. The bHelloTaskComplete variable is monitored by the ApplicationIdleTask.
 
 print_task.h
 Simple task with a while() loop that implements a simple print queue.
 
 rtos.h
 Essential functions to make the RTOS run.
 
 timer_task.h
 Simple task with a while() loop that waits for a semaphore from the timer ISR. After TIMER_TASK_COUNT iterations (set in src/freertos_sample_test_cases.h), the task breaks out of the while(1) loop, sets bTimerTaskComplete to "true", and suspends/deletes itself. The bTimerTaskComplete variable is monitored by the ApplicationIdleTask.
